up: CREATE TABLE Project (id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , codeName VARCHAR(50)  , deleted BOOLEAN  );

CREATE TABLE Feature (id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, project_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT fk_Feature_Project FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Project (id), name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , time INTEGER NOT NULL , completedDate null NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Person (id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , experience VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE Project_Persons (id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, project_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT fk_Project_Persons_Project FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Project (id), person_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT fk_Project_Persons_Person FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES Person (id));
